title: Establishes the agriculture assistance program for financial assistance to agricultural production and services in the state
summary: Establishes the agriculture assistance program for financial assistance to agricultural production and services in the state.

S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1357

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. HAWLEY, KOLB, GIGLIO, BURLING, CORWIN, McDONOUGH,
         FINCH  --  Multi-Sponsored  by  --  M. of A. BARCLAY, CALHOUN, CROUCH,
         DUPREY, HAYES, McKEVITT, J. MILLER, OAKS,  THIELE  --  read  once  and
         referred to the Committee on Agriculture

       AN  ACT  to amend the agriculture and markets law and the New York state
         urban development corporation act, in relation to  assisting  agricul-
         ture  in  the  state  through  the agriculture assistance program; and
         providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1. The agriculture and markets law is amended by adding a new
    2  article 21-D to read as follows:
    3                                ARTICLE 21-D
    4                       AGRICULTURE ASSISTANCE PROGRAM
    5  SECTION 258-QQ. LEGISLATIVE INTENT.
    6          258-RR. AGRICULTURE ASSISTANCE PROGRAM.
    7    S 258-QQ. LEGISLATIVE INTENT. THE LEGISLATURE HEREBY FINDS THAT  AGRI-
    8  CULTURE IS ONE OF THE PRIMARY ECONOMIC UNITS OF THE STATE AND THAT IT IS
    9  TO  THE  BENEFIT  OF ALL RESIDENTS THAT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE TO MAINTAIN
   10  AND  EXPAND  AGRICULTURE  PRODUCTION  AND   AGRICULTURAL   SERVICES   IS
   11  WARRANTED.  FURTHER, AGRICULTURE IN THOSE MUNICIPALITIES AND COMMUNITIES
   12  WHERE  AGRICULTURE  PRODUCTION  AND SERVICES HAVE BEEN HARMED BY NATURAL
   13  DISASTER OR WHICH ARE IN DECLARED DISASTER AREAS SHOULD BE GIVEN PREFER-
   14  ENCE IN RECEIVING FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE.
   15    S 258-RR.  AGRICULTURE  ASSISTANCE  PROGRAM.  THE  COMMISSIONER  SHALL
   16  DEVELOP  A  PROGRAM AND PROMULGATE RULES AND REGULATIONS FOR THE PURPOSE
   17  OF GIVING FINANCIAL  ASSISTANCE  TO  MAINTAIN  AND  EXPAND  AGRICULTURAL
   18  PRODUCTION  AND  AGRICULTURAL  SERVICES IN THE STATE. SUCH PROGRAM SHALL
   19  PROVIDE FOR PREFERENCE TO FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE TO AGRICULTURE  IN  THOSE
   20  MUNICIPALITIES  AND  COMMUNITIES  WHICH HAVE HAD AGRICULTURAL PRODUCTION

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03331-01-1

       A. 1357                             2

    1  AND SERVICES HARMED BY NATURAL  DISASTER  OR  WHICH  ARE  LOCATED  IN  A
    2  DECLARED DISASTER AREA. THE FUNDS FOR SUCH FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE SHALL BE
    3  RECEIVED  FROM  THE  NEW  YORK STATE URBAN DEVELOPMENT CORPORATION. ONLY
    4  ENTITIES  AND  PERSONS  ENGAGED  IN AGRICULTURAL PRODUCTION AND SERVICES
    5  SHALL BE ELIGIBLE TO RECEIVE FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE.
    6    S 2. Section 16-h of section 1 of chapter 174 of  the  laws  of  1968,
    7  constituting  the  New  York state urban development corporation act, is
    8  amended by adding a new subdivision 3-a to read as follows:
    9    3-A. NOTWITHSTANDING THE FOREGOING PROVISIONS OF THIS  SECTION,  FUNDS
   10  OF  THIS  PROGRAM, WITHIN AVAILABLE APPROPRIATIONS TOTALING UP TO THIRTY
   11  MILLION DOLLARS, SHALL  BE  AVAILABLE  FOR  THE  AGRICULTURE  ASSISTANCE
   12  PROGRAM PURSUANT TO ARTICLE 21-D OF THE AGRICULTURE AND MARKETS LAW.
   13    S  3.  This  act shall take effect immediately and shall expire and be
   14  deemed repealed December 31, 2012.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law and the New York state urban development corporation act, in relation to assisting agriculture in the state through the agriculture assistance program; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
